19 LaserFilter::LaserFilter()
20 {
21  if (!n_.getParam("frame_id", chassis_frame_))
22  {
23  chassis_frame_ = "base_link";
24  }
25  ROS_INFO("[laser_filter]: chassis_frame: %s", chassis_frame_.c_str());
26  std::string scan_topic;
27  if (!n_.getParam("scan_topic", scan_topic))
28  {
29  scan_topic = "/scan_filtered";
30  }
31  scan_sub_ = n_.subscribe("/scan", 1, &LaserFilter::scanCallback, this);
32  scan_pub_ = n_.advertise<sensor_msgs::LaserScan>(scan_topic.c_str(), 1);
33  if (n_.getParam("/laser_filter/lower_angle", lower_angle_))
34  {
35  ROS_INFO("[laser_filter]: Lower angle threshold: %f", lower_angle_);
36  }
37  else
38  {
39  ROS_WARN("[laser_filter]: Lower angle threshold not set");
40  lower_angle_ = -1.57;
41  }
42  if (n_.getParam("/laser_filter/upper_angle", upper_angle_))
43  {
44  ROS_INFO("[laser_filter]: Upper angle threshold: %f", upper_angle_);
45  }
46  else
47  {
48  ROS_WARN("[laser_filter]: Upper angle threshold not set");
49  upper_angle_ = 1.57;
50  }
51  float heading;
52  if(getLaserPose(heading))
53  {
54  ROS_INFO("[laser_filter] heading: %f", heading);
55  }
56  else
57  {
58  ROS_ERROR("[laser_filter] Transform to base_laser not available");
59  heading = 0;
60  }
61 // lower_angle_ -= heading;
62 // upper_angle_ -= heading;
63 
64 }
65 
66 int LaserFilter::getLaserPose(float& heading)
67 {
68  tf::StampedTransform transform;
69  ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
70  try
71  {
72  tf_listener_.waitForTransform(chassis_frame_.c_str(),
73  "base_laser",
74  now,
75  ros::Duration(30.0));
76  tf_listener_.lookupTransform(chassis_frame_.c_str(),
77  "base_laser",
78  now,
79  transform);
80  }
81  catch(tf::TransformException& ex)
82  {
83  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
84  return 0;
85  }
86  tf::Quaternion quat = transform.getRotation();
87  double roll, pitch, yaw;
88  tf::Matrix3x3(quat).getRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
89  heading = yaw;
90  return 1;
91 }

101 }

103 void LaserFilter::scanCallback22(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& input_scan)
104 {
105  float close = 1000;
106  int index = -1;
107  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < input_scan.ranges.size(); ++i)
108  {
109  if (input_scan.ranges[i] < close)
110  {
111  close =input_scan.ranges[i];
112  index = i;
113  }
114  }
115  ROS_INFO("The closest one is on %i value: %2.4f",index,close);
116 
117 }

119 void LaserFilter::scanCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& input_scan)
120 {
121 
122 
123  scan_.ranges.resize(input_scan.ranges.size());
124  scan_.intensities.resize(input_scan.intensities.size());
125 
126  double start_angle = input_scan.angle_min;
127  double current_angle = input_scan.angle_min;
128  ros::Time start_time = input_scan.header.stamp;
129  unsigned int count = 0;
130  //ROS_INFO("Start = %f", start_angle);
131  //loop through the scan and truncate the beginning and the end of the scan as necessary
132  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < input_scan.ranges.size(); ++i)
133  {
134  //Since the lidar has a f* upped coordinate system some magic needs to happen.
135 /*
136  if(upper_angle_ < lower_angle_){
137  /* This case presents itself when trying to read data in front of the robot. *
138  * What happens here is that data points behind the robot are filtered away. *
139  if(current_angle <= upper_angle_ or current_angle >= lower_angle_){
140  scan_.ranges[count] = input_scan.ranges[i];
141  //make sure that we don't update intensity data if its not available
142  if (input_scan.intensities.size() > i)
143  scan_.intensities[count] = input_scan.intensities[i];
144  count++;
145  current_angle += input_scan.angle_increment;
146  }
147  else{
148  current_angle += input_scan.angle_increment;
149  }
150  }*/
151 // else{
152  //wait until we get to our desired starting angle
153  if(start_angle < lower_angle_)
154  {
155  start_angle += input_scan.angle_increment;
156  current_angle += input_scan.angle_increment;
157  start_time += ros::Duration(input_scan.time_increment);
158  }
159  else
160  {
161  scan_.ranges[count] = input_scan.ranges[i];
162 
163  //make sure that we don't update intensity data if its not available
164  if (input_scan.intensities.size() > i)
165  scan_.intensities[count] = input_scan.intensities[i];
166  count++;
167  //check if we need to break out of the loop, basically if the next increment will put us over the threshold
168  if (current_angle + input_scan.angle_increment > upper_angle_)
169  {
170  break;
171  }
172 
173 // ROS_INFO("Current angle = %f, upper_angle = %f, lower_angle = %f", current_angle, upper_angle_, lower_angle_);
174  current_angle += input_scan.angle_increment;
175 // }
176  }
177 
178 }
179 
180 
181 
182  //populate the LaserScan message
183  scan_.header.frame_id = input_scan.header.frame_id;
184  scan_.time_increment = input_scan.time_increment;
185  scan_.angle_increment = input_scan.angle_increment;
186  scan_.scan_time = input_scan.scan_time;
187  scan_.range_min = input_scan.range_min;
188  scan_.range_max = input_scan.range_max;
189  scan_.header.stamp = start_time;
190  scan_.angle_min = start_angle;
191  scan_.angle_max = current_angle;
192 
193  scan_.ranges.resize(count);
194 
195  if (input_scan.intensities.size() >= count)
196  {
197  scan_.intensities.resize(count);
198  }
199  //laser_filter.publishScan();
200 }
